about_the_game:
First released in 2014 to much acclaim, "50 Pinch Barrage!!" is back and better than ever!

Use your heroic wit and technique to escape a gauntlet of pinches and traps!! Cinematic pinch-delivering action.

・You're a treasure hunter who's crash-landed on a remote desert island.
Can you overcome a relentless gauntlet of pinches and traps and safely escape the island…?!

・The controls used in the game is simple!
All kinds of terrain, traps, and enemies will stand in your way, but as the player, please do your best to figure out all the maneuvers and ways of getting out of each pinch!

・This game features a replay function that allows all play during the game to be recorded and replayed later on. An online ranking system in which all players can compete with clear-times globally is also featured.

・While preserving the game’s core fun as is, we’ve enhanced the playability of the new and improved “50 Pinch Barrage!” in certain areas based on the original version’s stages. We’ve also improved the game’s graphics, and it's overall easier to play now!

*The Free Edition is an original stage in which you can train your action gameplay skills.

Streaming Guideline

Regardless of whether it’s an individual or a brand, we welcome all streamers!

We have a simple streaming guideline, so we request that you check it before streaming our game.

We’ve also prepared assets for streaming purposes. Please check the official “50 Pinch Barrage!!” homepage for more details.

name: 50 Pinch Barrage!!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2125
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Shout-inducing 2D side-scrolling action! Alligators! Sharks! Zombies! Escape from a dangerous desert island! Its controls are simple but deep! Use your wit and technique to overcome perfectly balanced stages that will have you saying "Just one more try!!" as you play over and over again!
supported_languages:
Japanese*, English*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
